modal.title: Call Secret Agent
modal.subtitle: Get personalized sales guidance
modal.objectiveLabel: What is your goal in this conversation?
modal.objectivePlaceholder: E.g.: Schedule a demo meeting, close the sale, qualify the lead...
modal.difficultiesPlaceholder: E.g.: The lead is resistant to the price, hasn't responded in days, I didn't understand their objection...

team.title: Specialist Team
team.subtitle: Choose who will help you
team.analyzesAndRecommends: Analyzes the conversation and recommends the ideal specialist

diagnostico.name: Dr. Victor
diagnostico.title: Chief Sales Consultant
diagnostico.description: Sales director with 20 years of experience. Analyzes the conversation and recommends which specialist to call.
diagnostico.greeting: Let me analyze this conversation and give you a complete diagnosis!
diagnostico.placeholder: Leave blank for automatic analysis or describe your specific challenge...

closer.name: Sofia
closer.title: Closer Expert
closer.description: Closing specialist. Direct, results-focused, identifies the right moment to close.
closer.greeting: I'll help you close this deal!
closer.placeholder: E.g.: I want to schedule a closing meeting, I need to present the final proposal...

objections.name: Lucas
objections.title: Objections Specialist
objections.description: Expert at turning "no" into "maybe" and "maybe" into "yes". Empathetic and persuasive.
objections.greeting: Let's turn these objections into opportunities!
objections.placeholder: E.g.: The lead said it's too expensive, They said they need to think, They mentioned using a competitor...

relationship.name: Marina
relationship.title: Relationship Builder
relationship.description: Specialist in creating human connections. Warm, attentive, focuses on relationship before the sale.
relationship.greeting: Let's build a genuine connection with this lead!
relationship.placeholder: E.g.: I want to create rapport, I need to connect better with the lead, How to build trust...

discovery.name: Rafael
discovery.title: Discovery Master
discovery.description: Expert at asking the right questions. Curious, analytical, discovers what the customer really needs.
discovery.greeting: Let's discover this lead's real pain points!
discovery.placeholder: E.g.: I want to understand their pain points, I need to better qualify, I want to do discovery...

reengagement.name: Camila
reengagement.title: Re-engagement Specialist
reengagement.description: Expert at reviving stalled conversations. Persistent, creative, never gives up on a lead.
reengagement.greeting: Let's bring this lead back to life!
reengagement.placeholder: E.g.: Lead disappeared 2 weeks ago, Conversation went cold, How to resume contact...

input.mayTakeSomeSeconds: This may take a few seconds

panel.title: Agent Guidance
panel.callAgent: Call the Secret Agent to receive personalized tips on how to advance this conversation.

errors.generateFailed: Error generating guidance. Please try again.
